title: Capitol Hill Parks: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Certain specialized activities, such as a large public gathering or event of 25 people or more, for profit filming or photography, or any activity that disrupts normal public use of the Capitol Hill Parks, requires a permit. All permits are issued through the National Mall and Memorial Parks Permit Office. Please visit their page to apply or learn more about the National Park Service permitting process.
